sequence:
Loaded with Lead and Love

<size=45>Chapter 4 - Motivation?</size>

scripts.say: Port - Office
Master, please wipe your feet first.
In addition to her normal duties as secretary, Sheffield insisted on keeping the office clean as well.
Cleaning is a joy, after all. There is nothing more satisfying than seeing everything in order.
That is true. Ever since you took on the secretary position, the office has been refreshing and pristine.
I can't deny that my work productivity has increased as well, but...
I simply would like to point out that there are things that even I cannot keep in order. For example, this indolent Master here who loves to daydream.
What I was going to say was, I'm not sure if it's due to the clean work environment or to your strictness.
Sorry to intrude, Master. Belfast asked me to deliver this message to you.
Here you go. Don't worry about me, it's just how we handle internal affairs. Moreover, I figured I would take this opportunity to visit a fellow member of the Maid Team.
Sheffy, you look like you're quite accustomed to secretary work.
I have no idea who you're talking to. Or what you're talking about.
Hehe, I see. I was a bit worried at first, but it seems like everything is fine over here.
Commander, Sheffy might sound rude at times, but she would absolutely never do anything that she didn't want to do.
I see... In other words...
(Bang!)
How negligent. I forgot to clean up these two dirty spots.
I felt a cold gust go past my ear... Just now, was that a cleaning bullet?
Sheffield stood there calmly as if she hadn't just fired a warning shot into the wall.
I thought I had already cleaned here, but looks like I missed a spot. How careless of me.
Oh my, it looks like I've said some extraneous things. In any case, Master, please continue to get along well with Sheffy~
Newcastle grinned mischievously as she left the room. Just what part of this looks like "getting along?"
